meta.description: Language labels for module "web_txworkspacesM1" - header, description

languageKey.label: Workspaces
This module contains the overview of all elements within the current workspace and it enables to continue the review and publishing workflow for them.
Create and handle versioning workflows
Workspaces auto-publication
This tasks checks any workspace that has a publication date set in the past and automatically publishes it.
Ready to publish
